DOC.brief_summary: A prospective , single-arm , traditional feasibility study physician-modified fenestrated Cook Zenith TX2 aortic endograft base device adult patient meet traditional size criterion open surgical treatment thoracoabdominal aortic aneurysm . Patients merit surgical treatment aneurysm also meet inclusion exclusion criterion eligible enrollment . Patients follow 5 year post procedure . Major adverse event also record Sponsor-Investigator monitor locally appoint Data Monitoring Committee , Colorado Multiple Institutional Review Board , FDA .
